short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your glossaries on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use your offline txt glossaries on web pages you want. Your glossary stays in your browser, it is not uploaded to any web site.
* Bring your glossary to online translation web sites and benefit from your existing glossary.
* Use it to check if your terminology exists on a web page.
* If you are learning a language, see the terms you already have in your glossary to help practicing.
* You can give levels to each field/column in your glossary.
* Make enhanced searches on your glossary with Search section. This alone can be a good reason to install this extension.
* Use the product tour under How To Use to start quickly.

** It supports fuzzy/approximate matches in Search section, but it only supports exact matches in Home section.

** Please allow access to file URLs under extension details to be able to use offline txt files.
